amendment.description: To require notice and comment rulemaking, and prohibit disclosure of selection information, by the Corporation for National and Community Service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2173 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2173 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14507; text: CR S14507) To require notice and comment rulemaking, and prohibit disclosure of selection information, by the Corporation for National and Community Service.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2173 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2173 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 2150.
